definition: to lose/to leave behind/to omit/to bequeath/sth lost/involuntary discharge (of urine etc)

sentences.english: However, Sir Gus deplored Dr Fox's judgment.
sentences.chinese: 然而，奥唐奈对福克斯的决断深表遗憾。

sentences.english: It's a pity that you should have to leave.
sentences.chinese: 你非走不可真是很遗憾。

sentences.english: I am regretting to have to inform you that two cases of them are so bad in quality.
sentences.chinese: 我们遗憾地通知您，其中两箱，质量极为差劣。

sentences.english: We are sorry to hear about your business.
sentences.chinese: 听到你生意失败的消息，我们深表遗憾。

sentences.english: Sadly, Dad passed away this past January.
sentences.chinese: 遗憾的是，家父已于今年一月往生。

sentences.english: But such myopia is also deeply regrettable.
sentences.chinese: 但这样的近视也令人深感遗憾。

sentences.english: I very much want to buy the English dictionary, but unfortunately Idon't have enough money on me.
sentences.chinese: 我很想买这本英书契典，遗憾的是我身上带的钱不够。

sentences.english: It's a pity that you have missed such a wonderful concert.
sentences.chinese: 真遗憾，你错过了这么精彩的一场音乐会。

sentences.english: It is sad that many Chinese tend to be at loggerheads with their fellow Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 令人遗憾的是许多老中常与自己同胞相斗。

sentences.english: If well-planned, life will be one with fewer regrets.
sentences.chinese: 统筹好了，人生便少了许多遗憾。

sentences.english: Yao also is near the top of another, more unfortunate leaderboard.
sentences.chinese: 在另一个更令人遗憾的排行榜上，姚明也跻身前列。

sentences.english: Mr Garriott, however, is not just a holiday-maker.
sentences.chinese: 遗憾的是，加雷特先生不单单是来度假的。

sentences.english: I never met Julia again after that, which was a pity.
sentences.chinese: 从那以后我再也没有见到朱莉叶，真是遗憾。

sentences.english: The Chinese Government regrets your action.
sentences.chinese: 中国政府对你方采取的行动表示遗憾。

sentences.english: Unfortunately, it's a case of the fox guarding the henhouse.
sentences.chinese: 遗憾的是，这种做法无异于请狐狸去照看鸡窝。

sentences.english: Unfortunately a lot of people still don't know where it is.
sentences.chinese: 但遗憾的是，仍有很多人不知道香港地处何方。

definition: to regret/to feel that it is a great pity/to feel sorry for sb
to lose (sth)/to drop (sth)/to feel a sense of loss/frustrated/disappointment/loss
it is a pity/what a pity/unfortunately
helpless/without choice/for lack of better option/grudgingly/willy-nilly/nolens volens/abbr. for 無可奈何|无可奈何[wu2 ke3 nai4 he2]
reluctant to part with (sth or sb)/unwilling to let go of
reluctant to leave/to hate to have to go/to recall fondly
to feel sad/to feel unwell/(of life) to be difficult
